INJURY NEWS
Sunday, 7/30/2025
Saturday 3/4/2025 :
Alejo Romo was injured while making a catch.
Diagnosis: Jammed Finger.
He will be OK in about one week.
Sunday 3/5/2025 :
Eduardo Chavez was injured while running the bases.
Diagnosis: Bruised Foot.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 4 days.

Jose Gula was injured while running the bases.
Diagnosis: Inflamed Anterior Cruciate Ligament.
He will be OK in about 5 weeks.

Diagnosis: Concussion.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 1-2 weeks.
